meanings.definition: Lack of thoughtfulness or consideration for others.
meanings.sent1: Her constant inconsideratenesses towards her friends hurt their feelings.
meanings.sent2: The inconsideratenesses of the party guests left a mess for the host to clean up.
meanings.sent3: The inconsideratenesses of the noisy neighbors kept the whole street awake at night.
meanings.sent4: The inconsideratenesses of the driver on the road caused chaos for other commuters.
meanings.sent5: The inconsideratenesses of the students disrupted the peaceful atmosphere of the library.

meanings.definition: The quality of being thoughtless or careless in one's actions.
meanings.sent1: His inconsideratenesses often led to unintended consequences for himself.
meanings.sent2: The inconsideratenesses of the chef resulted in a burnt dinner for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The inconsideratenesses of the dog made a mess in the house when left alone.
meanings.sent4: The inconsideratenesses of the employee caused delays in the project completion.
meanings.sent5: The inconsideratenesses of the child led to broken toys and upset parents.
